channel.title: Animation on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Animation on LiaScript

item.title: ASCII-aRT
item.description: After writing systems, here is a quick intro into ASCII-aRT - the next evolutionary step of writing - and how it is integrated into LiaScript, such that you can integrate for example also formulas and animations to your image…

item.title: LiaScript: Crash-courSe in 13 Akten (German)
item.description: Dieses Tutorial führt in 13 „kurzen“ Schritt-für-Schritt Videos in die Kursentwicklung mit LiaScript ein, von der Installation des Editors hin zu den wichtigsten Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten.

item.title: Sister Fox and the Gray Wolf
item.description: These are two early translations of Russian folk take “sister fox and the gray wolf”.

item.title: LiaScript - BearLearn Talk 2019
item.description: This is an early example of a LiaScript presentation, that was given as a BearLearn Talk 2019 in Berlin.
